channel.title: Highscores problem PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
my highscores wont save it keeps giving this wierd error
[code]MySQL Error:INSERT INTO `skills`(`playerName`,`Attackxp`,`Defencexp`,`Strengthxp `,`Hitpointsxp`,`Rangexp`,`Prayerxp`,`Magicxp`,`Cookingxp`,`Woodcuttingxp`,`Flet chingxp`,`Fishingxp`,`Firemakingxp`,`Craftingxp`,`Smithingxp`,`Miningxp`,`Herblo rexp`,`Agilityxp`,`Thievingxp`,`Slayerxp`,`Farmingxp`,`Runecraftxp`) VALUES ('ze zima','383250','399750','418550','328755','6669100','6730000','0','0','2500','16 0','0','11718000','6800120','0','0','0','0','400','0','0','0'); java.lang.NullPointerException at highscore.query(highscore.java:24) at highscore.save(highscore.java:48) at client.process(client.java:18325) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:49) MySQL Error:INSERT INTO `skillsoverall` (`playerName`,`lvl`,`xp`) VALUES ('zezim a','716','33450585'); java.lang.NullPointerException at highscore.query(highscore.java:24) at highscore.save(highscore.java:50) at client.process(client.java:18325) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:49)[/code]

item.title: Highscores problem PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

my highscores wont save it keeps giving this wierd error

MySQL Error:INSERT INTO `skills`(`playerName`,`Attackxp`,`Defencexp`,`Strengthxp `,`Hitpointsxp`,`Rangexp`,`Prayerxp`,`Magicxp`,`Cookingxp`,`Woodcuttingxp`,`Flet chingxp`,`Fishingxp`,`Firemakingxp`,`Craftingxp`,`Smithingxp`,`Miningxp`,`Herblo rexp`,`Agilityxp`,`Thievingxp`,`Slayerxp`,`Farmingxp`,`Runecraftxp`) VALUES ('ze zima','383250','399750','418550','328755','6669100','6730000','0','0','2500','16 0','0','11718000','6800120','0','0','0','0','400','0','0','0'); java.lang.NullPointerException at highscore.query(highscore.java:24) at highscore.save(highscore.java:48) at client.process(client.java:18325) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:49) MySQL Error:INSERT INTO `skillsoverall` (`playerName`,`lvl`,`xp`) VALUES ('zezim a','716','33450585'); java.lang.NullPointerException at highscore.query(highscore.java:24) at highscore.save(highscore.java:50) at client.process(client.java:18325) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:152) at server.main(server.java:49)
